title: Instructional Agent Effect Optimization Strategies in Multimedia Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic multimedia learning tools
context.additional_context: A social network analysis and case application-centered curriculum for improving job efficiency among current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain how social cues in pedagogical agents reduce cognitive load.

Learners can apply six moderating variables (appearance, role, subject domain, media format, intervention duration, learning pace) to pedagogical agent design in practice, based on meta-analysis results.
Learners can evaluate cognitive load minimization strategies when designing mobile microlearning with pedagogical agents

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
